custom-sql.sql: SELECT timesheet_Task.taskId AS taskId, timesheet_Task.groupId AS groupId, timesheet_Task.companyId AS companyId, timesheet_Task.userId AS userId, timesheet_Task.userName AS userName, timesheet_Task.createDate AS createDate, timesheet_Task.modifiedDate AS modifiedDate, timesheet_Task.description AS description, timesheet_Task.projectId AS projectId, timesheet_Task.taskName AS taskName, timesheet_Task.taskType AS taskType FROM timesheet_Task, timesheet_TaskSession WHERE (timesheet_TaskSession.userId = ?) AND (timesheet_TaskSession.taskId = timesheet_Task.taskId) AND (timesheet_Task.taskType = ?) ORDER BY timesheet_TaskSession.modifiedDate ASC

SELECT timesheet_TaskSession.taskSessionId AS taskSessionId, timesheet_TaskSession.groupId AS groupId, timesheet_TaskSession.companyId AS companyId, timesheet_TaskSession.userId AS userId, timesheet_TaskSession.userName AS userName, timesheet_TaskSession.createDate AS createDate, timesheet_TaskSession.modifiedDate AS modifiedDate, timesheet_TaskSession.endTime AS endTime, timesheet_TaskSession.startTime AS startTime, timesheet_TaskSession.description AS description, timesheet_TaskSession.taskId AS taskId FROM timesheet_TaskSession WHERE (timesheet_TaskSession.companyId = ?) AND (timesheet_TaskSession.userId = ?) AND (( timesheet_TaskSession.startTime >= ?) AND ( timesheet_TaskSession.startTime < ?)) ORDER BY timesheet_TaskSession.startTime ASC

SELECT timesheet_TaskSession.taskSessionId AS taskSessionId, timesheet_TaskSession.groupId AS groupId, timesheet_TaskSession.companyId AS companyId, timesheet_TaskSession.userId AS userId, timesheet_TaskSession.userName AS userName, timesheet_TaskSession.createDate AS createDate, timesheet_TaskSession.modifiedDate AS modifiedDate, timesheet_TaskSession.endTime AS endTime, timesheet_TaskSession.startTime AS startTime, timesheet_TaskSession.description AS description, timesheet_TaskSession.taskId AS taskId FROM timesheet_TaskSession WHERE (timesheet_TaskSession.userId = ?) AND (timesheet_TaskSession.taskId = ?) AND ((timesheet_TaskSession.startTime > ?) AND (timesheet_TaskSession.startTime < ?)) ORDER BY timesheet_TaskSession.startTime ASC

SELECT {timesheet_TaskSession.*} FROM timesheet_Task, timesheet_TaskSession WHERE (timesheet_TaskSession.userId = ?) AND (timesheet_TaskSession.taskId = timesheet_Task.taskId) (timesheet_TaskSession.taskType = ? AND ((timesheet_TaskSession.startTime > ?) AND (timesheet_TaskSession.startTime < ?)) ORDER BY timesheet_TaskSession.startTime ASC
